entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
